EmailTemplate.subject: Fulfillment holiday reminder: Christmas December 25th
EmailTemplate.textOnly: December 14, 2021 Fulfillment holiday reminder: Christmas December 25th This is a reminder that SATURDAY Dec 25th, 2021, is a U.S. national holiday, and will be observed by NCR and our logistics provider on FRIDAY Dec 24th 2021. It is not considered a “business day”. Orders with a Service Level of Next Business Day (NBD) will be fulfilled as shown below. Orders with a Service Level of Next Calendar Day (NCD) will not be affected by the holiday. They will be shipped the same day as ordered and delivered the following day. Next Flight out (NFO) service will also be available every day, including Friday, the 24th and Saturday the 25th. Please remember 6:00PM Eastern Time is the daily cut off.
